title: Champion Spotlight: Haunt
body:
Welcome to the latest champion spotlight, presented by 2nd Chance.

This time, we'll be featuring Haunt --

https://i.gyazo.com/98f6644c5f3cb7a6d60534c41cb599f0.png
######(image above made by ChaoticBanana)

The Death Master.

Champion quote :  **_"I'm tilted as hell."_**

Let's begin with an oversight of Haunt's abilities :

____

http://musthavemom.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/Walmart-price-match.gif

Passive -- Walmart Price Match Guarantee
Haunt gets 1/5 off of all the starting fountain store's items using his Walmart Price Match Guarantee and can return items back that he's used for 1/2 the discounted purchase prices instead of the much lower regular return price.

http://puu.sh/lg2qm/b45e2cbf8a.jpg

Q -- Taken Energy Strike
Haunt takes 3% Max HP from all nearby enemy targets (champions, minions, monsters and epic monsters) within a 1000 radius, then using 1.5% (+10% AD, 30% AP) to heal himself while firing the other 1.5% as a skillshot energy bolt travelling a 1000 range at 1600 speed as magic damage (+ 60% AD, +10% AP).

http://imgur.com/6gvB2qT

W -- Best Of One's
Passive : When fighting an enemy champion alone with no ally enemy champions nearby in a 1500 radius, he gains a 2/4/6/8/10% physical and magic damage increase.
Active : Only able to activate when Best Of One's passive is active. Activating it increases the physical and magic damage increase by x1.5 and gives Haunt temporary 10% lifesteal and  10 / 15 / 20 / 25 / 30% attack speed for 3 / 3.5 / 4 / 4.5 / 5 seconds.

http://puu.sh/kN2ez/09e82809e2.jpg

E -- Ahri Main Wannabe
Haunt attempts to copy Ahri's ultimate badly, dashing a 225 / 260 / 300 distance (able to use twice within a 5 second activation before going on cooldown), fearing any targets hit by it for 1 second because of how anime it looks and dealing  70 / 90 / 110 / 130 / 150 physical damage (+ 50% AD).

http://puu.sh/mBQ6R/62b12cdb99.jpg

R -- Summon Norscout
Haunt places down a wrestling world champion gate upon the map within a 4500 / 5000 / 5500 radius, which summons the indestructible Norscout. Once placed, Norscout taunts all jabroni enemy champions and minions within a 700 radius for 3 seconds. Then Haunt blinks to Norscout's placed location, where all taunted targets then get knocked up and slammed back down immediately for 300 / 400 / 500 True damage (+4% Enemy Max HP% True Damage, + 20% AD, + 10% AP)  as he finally dismisses his partner in style for another ultimate combo in the future.

----

This is the part where we usually explain how to play the champion and make you really want to buy the release skin as well, but as you see he's clearly the best champion in the game, and you'll most likely find a better way to play him better than I can explain and be instantly hooked to whatever skin we release for him.

So have fun playing him summone- wait that term got olaf'd... uh... players?... my train of thought got riposted... whatever it works, and remember to do tons of damage!

http://i.imgur.com/tTa6ZTi.png

######Gratz on master again you glorious bugger you.
